## Source: ossf-package-analysis (938caf76a980377d45c9d19c1f2ec4567b4881cba4f93a64c5841b899f51dc6b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'machaque' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
